title: Silk Room
description: [Siren The Lynn Hagen ManLove Erotic Alternative Paranormal Romance, M/M, vampires, HEA] Paden's life couldn't be any more complicated if he tried. Michaya is his mate. The problem is, the man is a vampire. Not that Paden cares, but the king of fairies enforces strict laws, and Paden will pay a hefty price if he gives in to his desires and allows Michaya to claim him. Michaya is relentless when it comes to the pocket-sized fairy. Paden is his, and the cold shoulder treatment has gone on far too long. But when a contract falls into his lap, Michaya is torn between pursuing his mate and taking down a malicious drug lord. When Ricardo Delgado becomes Michaya's target, the drug lord has a few tricks of his own, and those tricks involve Paden. Not only does Paden have to dodge King Oberon, but Michaya has to stop his mate from becoming Delgado's next victim. ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Lynn Hagen
